snippet: Bob Wall, chosen by the Kings in the 1967 expansion draft, captained a team that had few recognizable veterans and few resources.
lead_paragraph: Bob Wall, chosen by the Kings in the 1967 expansion draft, captained a team that had few recognizable veterans and few resources.

headline.seo: Bob Wall, a Former Kings Captain, Follows Los Angeles’s Run
headline.main: Tracing Kings’ Run Toward Cup to a Scrappy Team of a Different Kind
headline.print_headline: Tracing Kings’ Run Toward Cup to a Scrappy Team of a Different Kind
